name: Seeds (SpeedFrame)
description:
A simple 2D farming game! Made for Quad Jam Spring!

How 2 play:
- Click on things in your hotbar to select them.
- Hoe the dirt piles (Click on them with your hoe)
- Click on seeds to buy them from the shop
- Water them (Click on planted seeds with the watering can)
- Sleep! (Click on the bed)
- Right click to harvest your beautifull crops!!!!

CREDITS
Programming: Me
Art: Hagge

Have fun?
